title: Leaked US documents reveal Israel’s plans for strike on Iran
content: The US government is investigating the leak of classified documents detailing Israel’s military actions against Iran. Originating from GEOINT and NSA, these Top Secret documents were shared online, prompting a probe into the breach and concerns over further sensitive information exposure.
summary: The US government is investigating the leak of classified documents detailing Israel’s military actions against Iran. Originating from GEOINT and NSA, these Top Secret documents were shared online, prompting a probe into the breach and concerns over further sensitive information exposure.

title: Prabowo Subianto takes oath as eighth president of Indonesia
content: Prabowo Subianto, sworn in as Indonesia's eighth president on Sunday, took his oath on the Quran in Jakarta. The ceremony saw attendance from global leaders and supporters. Subianto, a former defense minister and rival to ex-President Widodo, promises continuity of existing policies.
summary: Prabowo Subianto, sworn in as Indonesia's eighth president on Sunday, took his oath on the Quran in Jakarta. The ceremony saw attendance from global leaders and supporters. Subianto, a former defense minister and rival to ex-President Widodo, promises continuity of existing policies.

title: New literary treasure: Lost ghost story by 'Dracula' author Bram Stoker discovered in Dublin
content: A forgotten story by Dracula author Bram Stoker, titled 'Gibbet Hill', has been unearthed in Dublin by historian Brian Cleary. Hidden for over 130 years, the story is now being publicly displayed, enriching Stoker's literary legacy and offering insight into his early works.
summary: A forgotten story by Dracula author Bram Stoker, titled 'Gibbet Hill', has been unearthed in Dublin by historian Brian Cleary. Hidden for over 130 years, the story is now being publicly displayed, enriching Stoker's literary legacy and offering insight into his early works.

title: In Israeli footage of the last minutes of Hamas leader's life, some see a symbol of defiance
content: The final moments of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, captured in drone footage, show divergent reactions. In Gaza, some mourned or hoped for war's end, while across the Arab and Muslim world, he was seen as a heroic martyr. Israelis celebrated his demise, but critics argue that his death ignites further defiance among Palestinians.
summary: The final moments of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, captured in drone footage, show divergent reactions. In Gaza, some mourned or hoped for war's end, while across the Arab and Muslim world, he was seen as a heroic martyr. Israelis celebrated his demise, but critics argue that his death ignites further defiance among Palestinians.

title: 'We have power to change this moment': Usher endorses Harris; MAGA calls out singer's links to Diddy
content: Usher endorsed Kamala Harris for U.S. President at a rally in Atlanta. He highlighted her commitment to inclusivity and urged voter turnout in Georgia. Usher followed singer Lizzo, who had previously joined Harris' campaign. Some people criticized Usher for his alleged ties to controversial events, but his endorsement generated significant enthusiasm among Harris' supporters.
summary: Usher endorsed Kamala Harris for U.S. President at a rally in Atlanta. He highlighted her commitment to inclusivity and urged voter turnout in Georgia. Usher followed singer Lizzo, who had previously joined Harris' campaign. Some people criticized Usher for his alleged ties to controversial events, but his endorsement generated significant enthusiasm among Harris' supporters.

title: G7 defence ministers concerned by attacks on peacekeepers, vow Kyiv support
content: G7 defence ministers met in Naples amid multiple conflicts, expressing concern over Lebanon's situation and pledging unwavering support for Ukraine. The ministers emphasised continued military assistance to Ukraine and called for Iran to stop supporting Hamas and Hezbollah. There were also discussions on strengthening the UN peacekeeping mission in Lebanon and the impact of global instability.
summary: G7 defence ministers met in Naples amid multiple conflicts, expressing concern over Lebanon's situation and pledging unwavering support for Ukraine. The ministers emphasised continued military assistance to Ukraine and called for Iran to stop supporting Hamas and Hezbollah. There were also discussions on strengthening the UN peacekeeping mission in Lebanon and the impact of global instability.

title: Taiwan detects six aircraft, seven vessels near its territory
content: Taiwan's Ministry of National Defence detected six Chinese military aircraft and seven naval vessels near its territory, with two aircraft crossing the median line into Taiwan's southwestern ADIZ. Taiwan's President Lai Ching-te reassured the public of the government's dedication to defending the island's democracy in light of China's large-scale military exercises, which aim to intimidate and disrupt regional peace.
summary: Taiwan's Ministry of National Defence detected six Chinese military aircraft and seven naval vessels near its territory, with two aircraft crossing the median line into Taiwan's southwestern ADIZ. Taiwan's President Lai Ching-te reassured the public of the government's dedication to defending the island's democracy in light of China's large-scale military exercises, which aim to intimidate and disrupt regional peace.

title: Ferry dock collapses in Georgia; seven dead
content: At least seven people died when a ferry dock collapsed during Gullah-Geechee cultural celebrations on Sapelo Island, Georgia. The incident involved a boat striking the dock, causing several individuals to fall into the water. Authorities are continuing search operations and investigations. Georgia governor Brian Kemp expressed sorrow and urged prayers for the victims and their families.
summary: At least seven people died when a ferry dock collapsed during Gullah-Geechee cultural celebrations on Sapelo Island, Georgia. The incident involved a boat striking the dock, causing several individuals to fall into the water. Authorities are continuing search operations and investigations. Georgia governor Brian Kemp expressed sorrow and urged prayers for the victims and their families.

title: 'Just too easy to hack’: Elon Musk claims voting machines rig elections, calls for paper ballots
content: Elon Musk, during a Pennsylvania town hall, linked Dominion Voting Systems to alleged election rigging in Philadelphia and Arizona, advocating for paper ballots. Dominion countered, clarifying their non-operation in Philadelphia and emphasizing their system's accuracy through audits. Musk's remarks have intensified election security debates ahead of the 2024 campaign.
summary: Elon Musk, during a Pennsylvania town hall, linked Dominion Voting Systems to alleged election rigging in Philadelphia and Arizona, advocating for paper ballots. Dominion countered, clarifying their non-operation in Philadelphia and emphasizing their system's accuracy through audits. Musk's remarks have intensified election security debates ahead of the 2024 campaign.

title: China: President Xi directs PLA rocket force to strengthen deterrence and combat capabilities
content: China's President Xi Jinping inspected a brigade of the People's Liberation Army Rocket Force, emphasizing the need to enhance deterrence and combat capabilities. Xi urged the troops to strengthen targeted training with new equipment and methods, reinforcing the Party's absolute leadership. Meanwhile, Taiwan reported increased Chinese military activities near its territory.
summary: China's President Xi Jinping inspected a brigade of the People's Liberation Army Rocket Force, emphasizing the need to enhance deterrence and combat capabilities. Xi urged the troops to strengthen targeted training with new equipment and methods, reinforcing the Party's absolute leadership. Meanwhile, Taiwan reported increased Chinese military activities near its territory.

title: King Charles makes his first public appearance during Australia tour
content: King Charles III made his first public appearance in Sydney since his cancer diagnosis. His 9-day Australia tour includes addressing the New South Wales parliament and private meetings. Due to his health, large gatherings are limited. A group of protesters near a church called for Australia to 'decolonise,' reflecting mixed feelings about the monarchy.
summary: King Charles III made his first public appearance in Sydney since his cancer diagnosis. His 9-day Australia tour includes addressing the New South Wales parliament and private meetings. Due to his health, large gatherings are limited. A group of protesters near a church called for Australia to 'decolonise,' reflecting mixed feelings about the monarchy.

title: Pro-Liberation writers’ group attacked in Dhaka
content: Around 100 people attacked the Creative Writers Association during a protest in Dhaka after the cancellation of March 7 and August 15 as national days. The mob assaulted the protesters, identifying them with the Awami League, and chased them away. The Liberal Democratic Party called for banning the Awami League.
summary: Around 100 people attacked the Creative Writers Association during a protest in Dhaka after the cancellation of March 7 and August 15 as national days. The mob assaulted the protesters, identifying them with the Awami League, and chased them away. The Liberal Democratic Party called for banning the Awami League.

title: Fresh trouble for Harry Meghan? Locals of Portugal's Comporta don't want Royals to settle there
content: Prince Harry and Meghan face local backlash in Portugal for purchasing a holiday home, with residents upset over wealthy property owners restricting beach access. UK Express reported that restricting access to public beaches was illegal in Portugal until recently but new regulations now allow local councils and government agencies to designate certain beaches as "private".
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan face local backlash in Portugal for purchasing a holiday home, with residents upset over wealthy property owners restricting beach access. UK Express reported that restricting access to public beaches was illegal in Portugal until recently but new regulations now allow local councils and government agencies to designate certain beaches as "private".

title: 'Diddy was obsessed with Prince Harry, William because...' reveals ex-aide
content: Amid speculations over the princes' connection with the disgraced singer, Rob Shuter said Diddy's obsession with the princes was natural because he used to think himself as the king. "He thinks of himself as a king, so it makes perfect sense that he would like to have two princes in his entourage," Shuter said confirming that William and Harry never accepted Diddy's offer to join him.
summary: Amid speculations over the princes' connection with the disgraced singer, Rob Shuter said Diddy's obsession with the princes was natural because he used to think himself as the king. "He thinks of himself as a king, so it makes perfect sense that he would like to have two princes in his entourage," Shuter said confirming that William and Harry never accepted Diddy's offer to join him.

title: Rosie O'Donnell's daughter arrested for child neglect, 11-month-old found near meth pipe
content: Rosie O'Donnell's 27-year-old daughter, Chelsea Belle O'Donnell, faces child neglect and drug charges after police found her 11-month-old son near meth pipe. Officers discovered her Wisconsin home in disarray and uncovered evidence of drug trafficking and meth production, including needles, meth pipes, and 18 grams of meth. Chelsea called the police over a dispute with her boyfriend but the police uncovered drug trafficking at her place.
summary: Rosie O'Donnell's 27-year-old daughter, Chelsea Belle O'Donnell, faces child neglect and drug charges after police found her 11-month-old son near meth pipe. Officers discovered her Wisconsin home in disarray and uncovered evidence of drug trafficking and meth production, including needles, meth pipes, and 18 grams of meth. Chelsea called the police over a dispute with her boyfriend but the police uncovered drug trafficking at her place.

title: Watch: Lara Trump dances to Taylor Swift's song in campaign video; Swifties call it 'cringe'
content: Swift's fans are outraged over a Trump campaign video where Lara Trump and others dance to an edited version of Taylor Swift's song '22,' repurposed to support Donald Trump. Swift has previously clarified her political stance, endorsing Kamala Harris, and condemned the misleading use of her image.After Taylor's endorsement for Harris, Donald Trump said he hates Taylor Swift.
summary: Swift's fans are outraged over a Trump campaign video where Lara Trump and others dance to an edited version of Taylor Swift's song '22,' repurposed to support Donald Trump. Swift has previously clarified her political stance, endorsing Kamala Harris, and condemned the misleading use of her image.After Taylor's endorsement for Harris, Donald Trump said he hates Taylor Swift.

title: Laura Loomer says Harris should go to therapy for grief, nobody cares for her mother
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Vice President Kamala Harris over a post about her late mother's battle with cancer. Loomer harshly commented that no one cares about Harris' grief and suggested Harris should drop out of the presidential race. Loomer is known for controversial remarks, even drawing disapproval from GOP circles and former President Donald Trump.
summary: Far-right activist Laura Loomer criticized Vice President Kamala Harris over a post about her late mother's battle with cancer. Loomer harshly commented that no one cares about Harris' grief and suggested Harris should drop out of the presidential race. Loomer is known for controversial remarks, even drawing disapproval from GOP circles and former President Donald Trump.

title: Last few hours of singer Liam Payne's life at Buenos Aires hotel: New details emerge
content: Liam Payne's final hours in a Buenos Aires hotel before his fatal fall involved hallucinogenic drugs, alcohol, and an argument with a mystery woman. He partied with two escorts and displayed erratic behavior, smashing his laptop after an upsetting email. Police found drugs and alcohol in his chaotic room. Liam and his girlfriend Cassidy flown to Argentina to support Payne's former One Direction bandmate Niall Horan who had a concert there on October 2. But Cassidy left Argentina early though Liam begged her to stay.
summary: Liam Payne's final hours in a Buenos Aires hotel before his fatal fall involved hallucinogenic drugs, alcohol, and an argument with a mystery woman. He partied with two escorts and displayed erratic behavior, smashing his laptop after an upsetting email. Police found drugs and alcohol in his chaotic room. Liam and his girlfriend Cassidy flown to Argentina to support Payne's former One Direction bandmate Niall Horan who had a concert there on October 2. But Cassidy left Argentina early though Liam begged her to stay.

title: John Fetterman says Elon Musk is a concern for Democrats: 'Some people see him as Tony Stark'
content: ​Elon Musk has gone all out for supporting Donald Trump and will be a part of the Trump administration if the former president in back to the White House. Soon after the first assassination attempt of Donald Trump in Butler in July, Elon Musk announced his endorsement for Trump. As Donald Trump returned to Butler first time after the assassination attempt, he had Elon Musk with him and now Elon Musk is holding solo events in support of Donald Trump.
summary: ​Elon Musk has gone all out for supporting Donald Trump and will be a part of the Trump administration if the former president in back to the White House. Soon after the first assassination attempt of Donald Trump in Butler in July, Elon Musk announced his endorsement for Trump. As Donald Trump returned to Butler first time after the assassination attempt, he had Elon Musk with him and now Elon Musk is holding solo events in support of Donald Trump.

title: 81-year-old Georgia woman votes for the first time as her late husband never let her
content: At 81, Betty Cartledge cast her first vote in Georgia after her husband, who never allowed her to participate, passed away. Cartledge's newfound sense of civic duty has made her a social media sensation, with many praising her milestone and criticizing her late husband's authoritarian control. “I was so young and everything when we got married, I never really thought about it,” Cartledge said. “And then I got old, and I thought that it wouldn’t count to vote.”
summary: At 81, Betty Cartledge cast her first vote in Georgia after her husband, who never allowed her to participate, passed away. Cartledge's newfound sense of civic duty has made her a social media sensation, with many praising her milestone and criticizing her late husband's authoritarian control. “I was so young and everything when we got married, I never really thought about it,” Cartledge said. “And then I got old, and I thought that it wouldn’t count to vote.”
